name: Horizon Airways
about: Horizon Airways, founded in 1994, has a longstanding reputation for excellence in flight training. Located in Mackay and Cloncurry, the school offers comprehensive programs for Recreational, Private, and Commercial Pilot Licences, as well as various ratings. With a dedicated team of experienced instructors, Horizon Airways provides a supportive and professional environment for students to achieve their aviation goals. The school's commitment to quality training and safety has made it a trusted name in the industry, helping numerous students transition into successful careers in aviation. Horizon Airways is your reliable partner for all your flight training needs.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Multi-Pilot License (MPL)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating"]
